snippet: Home prices in Italy fell by as much as 30 percent from 2008 through 2015, but they are now stabilizing, especially at the high end....
abstract: International House Hunting column;  Casale della Sorgente, 32-acre compound near Tuscan medieval village of Sarteano, is listed at $1,942,500; information about market and tips for buying properties in Tuscany highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Home prices in Italy fell by as much as 30 percent from 2008 through 2015, but they are now stabilizing, especially at the high end.
